content:
# I have successfully extracted another stone brick, bringing my total to 10 stone bricks in my inventory. 
# The furnace is currently operational but has no ingredients left to smelt.

# To continue production, I will gather more stones. I will locate the nearest stone resource and harvest additional stones.

stone_position = nearest(Resource.Stone)  # Locate the nearest stone resource
move_to(stone_position)  # Move to the stone resource position
harvest_resource(stone_position, quantity=10)  # Collect more stone
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the inventory after harvesting stone.
